Reviews.Title: Misleaded photo with DVD Burner
Reviews.Author: Petou64
Reviews.Content: I have been misleading by the photos because saw one picture with DVD burner. I am a small business owner I bought three of them and now I am so disappointed.I think that amazon's customer service should remove the photo of this laptop with the DVD Burner in it.I have been buying from Amazon for years and for the first time I am so disappointed

Reviews.Title: Love this laptop
Reviews.Author: VE438954Giuseppe Vetri
Reviews.Content: I really like this laptop has a big screen, isnt slow and i can work on this. Really like it the only problem i have is that i downgraded to windows 7 because windows 8 sucks.

Reviews.Title: Another chromebook killer
Reviews.Author: Christian De Freitas
Reviews.Content: This laptop is like all the other i15RV laptops, what sets this one apart from the rest is the price, It has a Haswell Architechture celeron CPU, i really don't like Celerons, but this one runs OK, previous Celerons were a fork from Atom using very old architecture, this one is a fork from Haswell Pentium CPUs.The 320GB HDD is just OK, but easily upgradable to SSD and very cheap now a day, I recommend Samsung 840 EVO its very fast, highly ranked and affordable http://amzn.to/Ud0kx9It comes with windows 8, and entitled to a free windows 8.1 update.The screen has a standard resolution of 1366 x 768 and is pushed by a Intel Graphics HD 4400 coprocessor, sound is covered by e Waves Maxx Audio 4.0 and has built-in stereo speakers.Connectivity wise, it's loaded. it comes with* 2 USB 3.0* 2 USB 2.0* RJ 45 Jack* 802.11bgn wireless card* HDMI* DVD-RW* Bluetooth 4.0* 8 in 1 Card ReaderWhat I really would change is the microphone/speaker jack combo, I prefer this separate because I already have my headset. luckily i found this cable that lets me split the signal. http://amzn.to/1ngWqwEAnother thing a miss is a VGA port, since I already have a monitor that has VGA and DVI input but no HDMI, there's also an adapter to fix that.HDMI to VGA http://amzn.to/Ud1VD2HDMI to DVI http://amzn.to/1ujC09mIn the amazon description it says that this laptop is over 7lbs, its really a little under 5lbs.This laptop is really not for the tech savvy since you can feel it lag, and slows down very often. This laptop is more like a first computer, a backup computer, or even a laptop for grandparents.

Reviews.Title: Great computer, Great Price
Reviews.Author: Cindy Marie
Reviews.Content: Love the look, the ten key, everything but I wish it had 6 mg memory. great price for this computer though.

Reviews.Title: No Dvd Rom
Reviews.Author: trisa raiford
Reviews.Content: I was disappointed when i find out that i did not have a DVD ROM drive or what ever you call it I have to buy one and i think that is a waste of money for me I would like to know if I could send it back and get another one.

Reviews.Title: okay?
Reviews.Author: Shegwa725
Reviews.Content: It was great the first few weeks I got it except for some reason I couldn't use hands free mode, but I was okay with that. Then a couple of months passed and the videos that I watched on a website kept freezing, always stopped then started, or the audio would play and the video wouldn't. Any way I am still fine with it even though it is kinda slow.

Reviews.Title: diferent laptop information
Reviews.Author: ronaldo sosa
Reviews.Content: in the Amazon laptop specifications and photos appears a cd (optical) drive, but I received the laptop without this drive.

Reviews.Title: Dell Inspiron
Reviews.Author: Judy Hinton
Reviews.Content: We purchased 5 of these laptops for a village on the island of Guam. The children here are not as privileged as kids in the United States and the local village of Inarajan has just remodeled their village community center. The only thing missing was the CD player which would have been a plus

Reviews.Title: Happy, but not
Reviews.Author: Anita Rekowski
Reviews.Content: This is what my Grandaughter selected. She is very happy with it so far, but I'm not pleased with the 2 year policy I bought for extra protection against spills, drops, etc.  I paid $80 for this, and I have no proof I purchased this. I purchased this coverage from a separate Co. not Amazon, I tried to reach this Company, but I got no response.

Reviews.Title: good laptop
Reviews.Author: Richard Heenan
Reviews.Content: My last Dell died of old age.This one is much faster at the moment.However,it came with little or no instructions about how to get started!! I had to fumble my way to get it going.

Reviews.Title: step daughter
Reviews.Author: jessie1955
Reviews.Content: my step daughter love the computer , he old one was going out in the screen and now I can have my computer back thank you.

Reviews.Title: This is the one!
Reviews.Author: Jesse Harris
Reviews.Content: I am a college student that was in search for a laptop to buy on my own. It was a tedious search because I didn't know what kind of laptop to get and I was more worried about the style of the laptop. Well people, this is the one. I am glad that I broke the ice and decided to pay my money for this laptop.Now, this laptop does not have a CD/DVD Rom, which is ok with me. I cannot speak for the viewers.You wont regret it!

Reviews.Title: This is an excellent laptop...I am very pleased!!
Reviews.Author: Leon Waddell
Reviews.Content: This product deserves a 10 star rating!! Because I have always used Dell computers from desk to laps. And they are excellent well-made products. And I will always highly recommend Dell's computers to anyone.

Reviews.Title: perfect for what I need!
Reviews.Author: Richard G Ley
Reviews.Content: I have only owned desktop computers and have had a Kindle Fire for about a year. Once I found out that Windows XP was going to "expire", I decided to get a new computer and decided on a laptop.For the things I need to do, the computer is PERFECT! I love this item and strongly encourage anyone to consider owning one of these.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Robert J.
Reviews.Content: I bought and installed this for an elderly neighbor who's WInXP machine had finally given up the ghost. He was very depressed about getting a new one. We went through all the pros and cons of a desktop v laptop and finally got this one. It arrived very well packed and on times. It was installed and running with full Internet and email access in a couple of hours and the Win 8.1 interface too surprisingly little time for him to adjust to. He is happy. I am happy and the unit taught me that WIn 8.1 does not live up tot the horrors stories I had heard.

Reviews.Title: No Optical (whatever that is) CD / DVD drive
Reviews.Author: The Librarian
Reviews.Content: Who ever heard of a computer that doesn't have a CD / DVD drive??? Anyway, this one is going back. The positive note is that we only wasted an hour and a half. But now I have a very disappointed child. And she has a mad mama.

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel Celeron-2955U Processor
4 GB DDR3
320 GB 5400 rpm Hard Drive
15.6-Inch Screen
Windows 8
ProductInfo.Name: Dell Inspiron 15.6-Inch Laptop (i15RV-1909BLK)
